Title: Food Delivery
Description: A large selection of food. Convenient shopping cart. You can choose a delivery method, specify your address and choose a convenient delivery time

Title: BizCard - Business Card Generator
Description: BizCard helps you create interactive and responsive digital business cards. One of the key elements of our cards is the QR code. You will be able to create a QR code that will contain important information about you or your company

Title: E-commerce Fashion store
Description: Convenient navigation that allows you to quickly find the products you need. Your cart stores all the items you've selected, allowing you to view them, edit the quantity or remove items you don't need, and checkout

Title: E-commerce Website
Description: The Add to cart button allows you to quickly select the desired quantity and add it to the cart. To place an order, you need to be authorized or registered with Firebase. This allows us to ensure the safety and security of your personal information.

Title: Module House
Description: The site provides detailed information cards for each modular home. You can view floor plans, renderings, and photos to get an idea of what the home will look like. In addition, you can familiarize yourself with the technical characteristics

Title: E-commerce Website
Description: An e-commerce site specializing in the sale of furniture. Each furniture product has its own detailed page with photos, description and technical characteristics. The cart will always display the number of selected products and their total cost. You can view the contents of your cart, make changes if necessary, and proceed to checkoutt

Title: E-commerce Website  Real Home
Description: A site where you can find and buy your dream apartment. We offer a wide selection of real estate in various cities around the world. On our website, you can quickly and conveniently view various apartment options. In addition, the site provides detailed information about the location and infrastructure around each apartment. The site also provides an opportunity to contact the team of sales agents

Title: SMM courses
Description: Landing to display information about the course and speakers. It is also possible to register for the course and apply for participation

Title: Rent Car
Description: Car rental site. Animation on the main page and display of available cars for rent. Car selection and map display are also available at the company's office.

Title: Alex VRBK portfolio
Description: Built a Vuejs web-app that showcases my portfolio, skills, experiences and a quick and easy way to reach out to me. My portfolio is an embodiment of my creativity and my skills as a frontend developer.

Title: E-commerce Website
Description: Online clothing store. The function of viewing the product in the catalog, sorting the products and adding them to the basket and calculating.

Title: Must Movie
Description: A movie search platform showing movie rating, rating, posters and description and various additional information

Title: Druzi
Description: DRUZI marketing hub is the one-stop marketing agency for all marketing tasks.

Title: Lviv Travel
Description: A platform for tourists looking for a quick solution for tourism. Placed points of interest and events poster. Development of the interface part.

Title: Marketplace NFT
Description: NFT Marketplace is a platform for selling digital art and collectibles.
